title: Birds-of-a-Feather Sessions
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {3111=Presenters, Demo-ers, Participants: Thanks very much for your participation in Linux Foundation's Embedded Linux Conference 2011.}
textBeforeTable: Keynotes NOTE: If you add a wikilink to your presentation and attempt to upload it via the link, it may fail. If it does, use the Special:Upload page to upload your file. Table of Presentations Presenters: Please post your technical conference presentations on this page. (See Instructions below the tables) Instructions Videos from the conference will be made available at a future date. Videos 3.4 Instructions for Presenters 3.3 Birds of a Feather Session 3.2 Presenters 3.1 Keynotes 3 Table of Presentations 2 Instructions 1 Videos Contents This page is for collecting the presentations that were made at the conference. During and after the conference we will collect materials from the presenters and place them here. Please watch this page if you are interested in a particular presentation - and if it doesn't show up, please send me an e-mail and we'll try to track it down. Presenters, Demo-ers, Participants: Thanks very much for your participation in Linux Foundation's Embedded Linux Conference 2011. search navigation, Jump to:
